mapper.insert: insert into facility(facility_id, facility_name, open_time, close_time, default_time,basic_fee,extra_fee,contact, info, caution, court,product, facility_status, facility_images) values(#{facility_id}, #{facility_name}, #{open_time}, #{close_time}, #{default_time}, #{basic_fee}, #{extra_fee}, #{contact}, #{info}, #{caution}, #{court}, #{product}, #{facility_status}, #{facility_images})
